name: PHYS 135
title: Astrophysics Advanced Laboratory
description: Introduction to the techniques of modern observational astrophysics at optical and radio wavelengths through hands-on experiments. Offered in some academic years as a multiple-term course: PHYS 135A in fall and PHYS 135B in winter, depending on astronomical conditions.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: physics (astrophysics) majors. Intended primarily for juniors and seniors majoring or minoring in astrophysics.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): PHYS 133 and at least one astronomy course. Enrollment is restricted to physics (astrophysics) majors. Intended primarily for juniors and seniors majoring or minoring in astrophysics.
